title: Blue Tao Organic Restaurant and Pizzeria
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Chinese, Indian, Organic, Thai, Fast food, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. As of Apr 2010 serves fish and chicken in addition to veg menu. Menu is divided into organic and non-organic food. Has many vegan options including vegan burger, tempeh, seitan, tofu. Bread is vegan and is baked in-house. Location is right next to the main road near the beach before Don Joao Hotel. Confirmed open Dec 2013.
